Yenson is a full-stack engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications using React, Angular, Next.js, and cloud-native technologies at Wind River. He combines strong technical depth across the stack with an entrepreneurial mindset, having founded multiple successful projects.

His strongest technical areas are modern frontend frameworks (React, Angular, Next.js) paired with robust backend systems using Node.js, Java, PostgreSQL, and containerized deployments with Docker and Nginx. He has particular depth in building cloud-native distributed systems.

What sets Yenson apart is his rare combination of deep technical skills and entrepreneurial drive — he's not just an engineer, he's a founder who has built and shipped multiple production products from scratch, including e-commerce platforms and AI-powered tools.

Yenson started in customer-facing technical support roles, where he developed strong communication and problem-solving skills, then rapidly transitioned into software engineering at Wind River — progressing from intern to full-stack engineer in under two years.

Yenson would thrive in a fast-paced, product-driven team that values full-stack ownership and entrepreneurial thinking. He's ideal for companies building cloud-native applications where engineers own features end-to-end.
